directions: Whisk together all ingredients except chicken, then coat chicken all over with sauce. Arrange thighs, skin sides up in 1 layer without crowding, in a foil-lined large shallow baking pan (1 inch deep). Roast in upper third of oven until chicken is cooked through and glaze is brown, 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon finely grated peeled fresh ginger
1/2 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes
8 chicken thighs with skin and bones (2 3/4 pounds)
title: Spicy Hoisin Chicken
